description: Takes in filters and returns a list of managed nodes matching the filter criteria.

parameters.name: SyncName
parameters.description: The name of the Amazon Web Services managed resource data sync to retrieve information about. For cross-account/cross-Region configurations, this parameter is required, and the name of the supported resource data sync is AWS-QuickSetup-ManagedNode. For single account/single-Region configurations, the parameter is not required.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: One or more filters. Use a filter to return a more specific list of managed nodes. (dict) --- The filters for the operation. The name of the filter. A filter value supported by the specified key. For example, for the key PlatformType, supported values include Linux and Windows. (string) --- Type (string) --- The type of filter operator.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: A filter value supported by the specified key. For example, for the key PlatformType, supported values include Linux and Windows.

nested_items.name: Nodes
nested_items.description: A list of managed nodes that match the specified filter criteria.

nested_items.name: CaptureTime
nested_items.description: The UTC timestamp for when the managed node data was last captured.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The ID of the managed node.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the managed node.

nested_items.name: OrganizationalUnitId
nested_items.description: The ID of the organization unit (OU) that the account is part of.

nested_items.name: OrganizationalUnitPath
nested_items.description: The path for the organizational unit (OU) that owns the managed node. The path for the OU is built using the IDs of the organization, root, and all OUs in the path down to and including the OU. For example:

nested_items.name: Region
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region that a managed node was created in or assigned to.

nested_items.name: AgentType
nested_items.description: The type of agent installed on the node.

nested_items.name: AgentVersion
nested_items.description: The version number of the agent installed on the node.

nested_items.name: ComputerName
nested_items.description: The fully qualified host name of the managed node.

nested_items.name: InstanceStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the managed node.

nested_items.name: IpAddress
nested_items.description: The IP address of the managed node.

nested_items.name: ManagedStatus
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the node is managed by Systems Manager.

nested_items.name: PlatformType
nested_items.description: The operating system platform type of the managed node.

nested_items.name: PlatformName
nested_items.description: The name of the operating system platform running on your managed node.

nested_items.name: PlatformVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the OS platform running on your managed node.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The type of instance, either an EC2 instance or another supported machine type in a hybrid fleet.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use when requesting the next set of items. If there are no additional items to return, the string is empty.
